subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chad LaRose had his first two-goal game and the Carolina Hurricanes sent Martin Brodeur to the bench with 4 goals on their first 12 shots in a 7-2 victory against the Devils yesterday at Continental Arena.
snippet: Chad LaRose had his first two-goal game and the Carolina Hurricanes sent Martin Brodeur to the bench with 4 goals on their first 12 shots in a 7-2 victory against the Devils yesterday at Continental Arena.
